column1: Kata Robata////One of the couples ordered the pork belly and papaya salad for the table to share as a starter. It was super delicious and an awesome way to start the meal. My fiance and I each got salmon
column3: and eel sushi and decided to Texas Hamachi and the Tropical Spicy Tuna rolls. The sushi was very fresh
column4: and I really loved the eel. The rolls were a little disappointing. I guess they are trying to showcase the freshness of the fish
column5: but both were underwhelming on flavor. We finished the meal with the green tea souffle cheesecake. It was also nothing to write home about. Overall
column6: I was really impressed by the fresh sushi at Kata
column7: but wanted a little more flavor and wow factor.
